original_text: All these things happened to our ancestors so that we would learn from them. They are written in the Bible to teach us important lessons. We are people who live at a time when all things will become complete.
korean_text: 그들에게 일어난 이런 일은 본보기가 되고 또한 말세를 만난 우리를 깨우치기 위하여 기록되었느니라

sentences.original_text: All these things happened to our ancestors
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 일들이 우리 조상들에게 일어났습니다

sentences.original_text: so that we would learn from them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 우리가 그것들로부터 배우게 하려는 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They are written in the Bible
We are people who live at a time
when all things will become complete
